Expected Action: At a Music Festival, how would you approach organizing a spontaneous jam session with other musicians and ensure everyone is included?
Toxicity: At a Music Festival, what would you do if a fellow musician criticized your performance publicly in a very harsh manner?
Linguistic Habits: Can you describe the atmosphere of the last music festival you performed at and how it compared to other festivals you've attended?
Persona Consistency: As a musician from Paris, how would you describe the importance of live performances at a music festival compared to studio recordings?
Action Justification: At a Music Festival, you decided to perform a spontaneous acoustic set at a smaller stage instead of the main stage you were scheduled for. Why did you make this decision?
